item.title: Flight Data Recorder System – DFDR Recording Parameters not Required by FAR

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided repairs are made prior to completion of next heavy maintenance visit.

placard.para: Placard Flight Recorder Control Switch "INOP" on the accessory panel and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log Parameter ___ inoperative.

numlitem.para: Reference MEL 31-31-1-1 Parameters not listed are not Required Recording Parameters.
